title: Is esé mexican or spanish?
body: Ok so me and a friend had a bit of a dispute and i need to settle this. I said 'esé is used by mexicans not spanish people' and he just did not give in. Please write below whether you think it is a mexican or a spanish word. Thanks.

replies.body: You're pretty dense, it's kinda cute, we're sending you to Japan and then a tour to China with a stop on the way in Africa!
you are savage kats. you say really really offensive things in the most cheerful tone. you are cold savage g fam

mexican isn't a language.
fucking hell.
the language is spanish (they speak spanish in mexico) but it's like a slang word thats most common in mexico i think

how autistic are you? mexican or spanish? lmao. were you born stupid or did you develop a strong case of retardation over your lifetime? was your school autistic? is it your parents? who's to blame for raising a child that asks this kind of question

> [{quoted}](name=Homura Akemi,realm=OCE,application-ed id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=aZb8KJFy,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-04-10T14:10:16.598+0000)
>
> how autistic are you? mexican or spanish? lmao. were you born stupid or did you develop a strong case of retardation over your lifetime? was your school autistic? is it your parents? who's to blame for raising a child that asks this kind of questioneven suppo

What is wrong with this question? Its not that hard to understand that 2 different countries have different cultures, different slang and different people altogether. And calling me autistic? How is that even supposed to be an insult that i can take seriously lmao. You must be the 'autistic' one if you think mexico and spain are the same....

jesus fking christ you are more retarded than thought. GoldenTomat0 (OCE)  - about 12 hours ago
mexican isn't a language.
fucking hell.  

if you don't understand this you are truly a useless human

Spanish is the language spoken in Mexico, Thus making the word Spanish, but allowing for mexican-spanish I guess. Just think of it as American-english and Australian-english. They say Soda, we say soft drink. They say Sofa, we say Couch.
And the question was is esé used by mexican or spanish people, nothing to do with language
is ping pong china or chinese?
Fair enough, but which language do you think uses it more is kind of the question

>
> Please write below whether you think it is a mexican or a spanish word. Thanks.

??????
yes, it was. it's used my mexicans speaking english. it's like the mexican version of nigga for black people or mate/cunt for australians.

Thank you for actually replying with an answer
What makes you think both wouldn't use that word???
Neither are languages like chilean. They arent their own language but they have certain slang that isnt considered spanish
